result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal 4th+)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Shannon L. Reedy

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Clerk Marisa.
Case Called: 3:40 pm 
INCLUDES 13CF143, 15CM690, AND 15CM1233. 
State appears by ADA Kerri Puig; Def appears in person with Atty Julie Sawyer. 

PLEA HEARING IN 15CM690 AND 15CM1233. 
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed. VRCW.

State moves to: 
In 15CM690: Ct. 1 (OAR/Repeater)>>D&RI. 
In 15CM1233: Ct. 2 (Misd. BJ/Repeater)>>D&RI. 
COURT grants above. 

PLEA: In 15CM1233: Ct. 1 (Obstructing an Officer/Repeater)>>NO CONTEST. 

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis, & def guilty. 
Def makes statement. 
COURT ORDERS: In 15CM1233: Ct. 1>> 2 years imprisonment -1 year IC and 1 year ES - imposed and STAYED for 1 year probation - CONDITIONS: assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by the dept; absolute sobriety from drugs/alcohol except for prescriptions taken as prescribed; fulltime employment/schooling of at least 30 hours per week or if not, perform 10 hours of CS per week; court costs. 
COURT ORDERS sentence consecutive to sentence in 13CF143. 
COURT finds the def is entitled to NO days jail credit in 15CM1233. 
COURT finds the def is eligible for CIP and SAP. 

SENTENCING AFTER REVOCATION IN 13CF143. 
COURT ORDERS: On. Ct. 2 (Possession of Methamphetamine/Repeater)>>2 years imprisonment - 1 year IC and 1 year ES - CONDITIONS OF ES: assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by the dept; AODA; absolute sobriety from drugs/alcohol except for prescriptions taken as prescribed and with prior agent authorization; fulltime employment/schooling of at least 30 hours per week or if not, perform 10 hours of CS per week; court costs including DNA surcharge.  
COURT finds the def is entitled to 414 days sentence credit. 
COURT finds the def is eligible for CIP and SAP. 

COURT remands def into custody for transport to WI State Prison System. 

Adj: 3:54 pm

Pre-trial conference on June 29, 2015 at 09:45 am.
Final pre-trial on July 20, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Jury Trial on July 29, 2015 at 09:00 am.

Court ordered a $750.00 sig. bond on 6-3-15
Original warrant returned from Sheriff's Dept.
NO RECORDS FOUND ON TIME SYSTEM
Shall not drive a motor vehicle without valid driver's license.  Contact Attic Correctional Services at 715-848-3202 before 6/29/15.
